issue.title: Terminology for objects whose types model a concept

discussion.p: During review the suggestion was raised that it might be helpful to be able to talk about "an object that models `Concept`" instead of "an object whose type models `Concept`" or other more verbose forms.
Set priority to 3 after reflector poll.
"OK with finding a way to shorten this, but not as suggested above. Overloading the term "models Concept" for both objects and types would be confusing."
